resources.string: Why not play %1$s? You\'re on an island. Does it really matter?
Consider playing %1$s. It\'s a jgl gap no matter what you do.
Have you considered %1$s? Pro-play will probably get them nerfed soon.
Play %1$s! You\'re going to get one-shot regardless.
%1$s is pretty cool. Just remember to abandon your adc at 7mins!
